files.name: .editorconfig
files.content:
root = true

[*]
charset = utf-8
indent_style = space
indent_size = 2
end_of_line = lf
insert_final_newline = true
trim_trailing_whitespace = true

files.name: .prettierrc.yml
files.content:
# ä¸€è¡Œæœ€å¤š 120 å­—ç¬¦
printWidth: 120
# ä½¿ç”¨ 2 ä¸ªç©ºæ ¼ç¼©è¿›
tabWidth: 2
# ä¸ä½¿ç”¨ç¼©è¿›ç¬¦ï¼Œè€Œä½¿ç”¨ç©ºæ ¼
useTabs: false
# è¡Œå°¾ä¸éœ€è¦åˆ†å·
semi: true
# ä½¿ç”¨å•å¼•å·
singleQuote: true
# å¯¹è±¡çš„ key ä»…åœ¨å¿…è¦æ—¶ç”¨å¼•å·
quoteProps: as-needed
# jsx ä¸ä½¿ç”¨å•å¼•å·ï¼Œè€Œä½¿ç”¨åŒå¼•å·
jsxSingleQuote: false
# æœ«å°¾ä¸éœ€è¦é€—å·
trailingComma: none
# å¤§æ‹¬å·å†…çš„é¦–å°¾éœ€è¦ç©ºæ ¼
bracketSpacing: true
# jsx æ ‡ç­¾çš„åå°–æ‹¬å·éœ€è¦æ¢è¡Œ
jsxBracketSameLine: false
# ç®­å¤´å‡½æ•°ï¼Œåªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦æ‹¬å·
arrowParens: avoid
# æ¯ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼åŒ–çš„èŒƒå›´æ˜¯æ–‡ä»¶çš„å…¨éƒ¨å†…å®¹
rangeStart: 0
# ä¸éœ€è¦å†™æ–‡ä»¶å¼€å¤´çš„ @prettier
requirePragma: false
# ä¸éœ€è¦è‡ªåŠ¨åœ¨æ–‡ä»¶å¼€å¤´æ’å…¥ @prettier
insertPragma: false
# ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤çš„æŠ˜è¡Œæ ‡å‡†
proseWrap: preserve
# æ ¹æ®æ˜¾ç¤ºæ ·å¼å†³å®š html è¦ä¸è¦æŠ˜è¡Œ
htmlWhitespaceSensitivity: css
# æ¢è¡Œç¬¦ä½¿ç”¨ lf
endOfLine: lf
# åç¼€æ–‡ä»¶åç‰¹æœ‰è§„åˆ™
overrides:
  - files: '*.{wxss,less}'
    options:
      parser: less
  - files: '*.json,.*rc'
    options:
      parser: json
  - files: '*.{wxml,html}'
    options:
      parser: html
      htmlWhitespaceSensitivity: strict
      # é¿å…textæ ‡ç­¾æ¢è¡Œ
      printWidth: 999
  - files: '*.wxs'
    options:
      parser: babel

files.name: .travis.yml
files.content:
language: node_js

node_js:
  - '10'

matrix:
  include:
    - os: linux
    - os: osx

sudo: false

before_install:
  - if [[ "$TRAVIS_OS_NAME" == "linux"                      ]] ; then sudo apt-get -qq update        ; fi
  - if [[ "$TRAVIS_OS_NAME" == "linux" && ! $(which expect) ]] ; then sudo apt-get install -y expect ; fi
  - if [[ "$TRAVIS_OS_NAME" == "osx"                        ]] ; then stty cols 80                   ; fi
  - if [[ "$TRAVIS_OS_NAME" == "osx"                        ]] ; then brew update                    ; fi
  - if [[ "$TRAVIS_OS_NAME" == "osx"   && ! $(which expect) ]] ; then brew install expect            ; fi

install:
  - 'npm install'
  - 'npm run bootstrap'

script:
  - 'npm run test'
  - 'npm run bootstrap:prod'
  - 'npm run test:build'

after_script: 'npm install coveralls && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage'

files.name: CHANGELOG.md
files.content:
# Change Log

## 2.1.0 (2020-07-04) (beta)

#### :rocket: New Feature
* `core`
  * [#2634](https://github.com/Tencent/wepy/pull/2634) feat: added routed lifecycle ([@Gcaufy](https://github.com/Gcaufy))
* `babel-plugin-import-regenerator`, `cli`, `compiler-babel`, `compiler-less`, `compiler-postcss`, `compiler-sass`, `compiler-stylus`, `compiler-typescript`, `core`, `plugin-define`, `plugin-eslint`, `plugin-uglifyjs`, `redux`, `use-intercept`, `use-promisify`, `x`
  * [#2620](https://github.com/Tencent/wepy/pull/2620) feat: added ci npm release support ([@Gcaufy](https://github.com/Gcaufy))

#### :bug: Bug Fix
* `core`
  * [#2633](https://github.com/Tencent/wepy/pull/2633) fix(core): ä¿®å¤äº† type å¿…å¡«çš„é—®é¢˜ ([@Gcaufy](https://github.com/Gcaufy))

#### Committers: 5
- Damon Chen ([@chenyu445](https://github.com/chenyu445))
- Deep ([@deepfunc](https://github.com/deepfunc))
- Gcaufy ([@Gcaufy](https://github.com/Gcaufy))
- Sail ([@dlhandsome](https://github.com/dlhandsome))
- è¿™ä¹Ÿå¤ªé‚£ä¸ªäº†å§ ([@dev-itsheng](https://github.com/dev-itsheng))

WePY æŒç»­æ‹›å‹Ÿè´¡çŒ®è€…ï¼Œå³ä½¿æ˜¯åœ¨ issue ä¸­å›ç­”é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæˆ–è€…åšä¸€äº›ç®€å•çš„ bugfix ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¼šç»™ WePY å¸¦æ¥å¾ˆå¤§çš„å¸®åŠ©ã€‚

## Issue æäº¤

#### å¯¹äºè´¡çŒ®è€…

åœ¨æ issue å‰è¯·ç¡®ä¿æ»¡è¶³ä¸€ä¸‹æ¡ä»¶ï¼š

- å¿…é¡»æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª bug æˆ–è€…åŠŸèƒ½æ–°å¢ã€‚
- å¿…é¡»æ˜¯ WePY ç›¸å…³é—®é¢˜ï¼ŒåŸç”Ÿå°ç¨‹åºé—®é¢˜å»[å¼€å‘è€…è®ºå›](https://developers.weixin.qq.com/)ã€‚
- å·²ç»åœ¨ issue ä¸­æœç´¢è¿‡ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°ç›¸ä¼¼çš„ issue æˆ–è€…è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚
- å®Œå–„ä¸‹é¢æ¨¡æ¿ä¸­çš„ä¿¡æ¯

å¦‚æœå·²ç»æ»¡è¶³ä»¥ä¸Šæ¡ä»¶ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æä¾›äº† issue çš„æ ‡å‡†æ¨¡ç‰ˆï¼Œè¯·æŒ‰ç…§æ¨¡æ¿å¡«å†™ã€‚

â€‹             

##  Pull request

æˆ‘ä»¬é™¤äº†å¸Œæœ›å¬åˆ°æ‚¨çš„åé¦ˆå’Œå»ºè®®å¤–ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¹Ÿå¸Œæœ›æ‚¨æ¥å—ä»£ç å½¢å¼çš„ç›´æ¥å¸®åŠ©ï¼Œå¯¹æˆ‘ä»¬çš„ GitHub å‘å‡º pull request è¯·æ±‚ã€‚

ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯å…·ä½“æ­¥éª¤ï¼š

#### Forkä»“åº“

ç‚¹å‡» `Fork` æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œå°†éœ€è¦å‚ä¸çš„é¡¹ç›®ä»“åº“ fork åˆ°è‡ªå·±çš„ Github ä¸­ã€‚

#### Clone å·² fork é¡¹ç›®

åœ¨è‡ªå·±çš„ github ä¸­ï¼Œæ‰¾åˆ° fork ä¸‹æ¥çš„é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œgit clone åˆ°æœ¬åœ°ã€‚

```bash

```

#### æ·»åŠ  WePY ä»“åº“

å°† fork æºä»“åº“è¿æ¥åˆ°æœ¬åœ°ä»“åº“ï¼š

```bash
$ git remote add <name> <url>
# ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š

```

#### ä¿æŒä¸ WePY ä»“åº“çš„åŒæ­¥

æ›´æ–°ä¸Šæ¸¸ä»“åº“ï¼š

$ git pull --rebase <name> <branch>

```

#### commit ä¿¡æ¯æäº¤

commit ä¿¡æ¯è¯·éµå¾ª[commitæ¶ˆæ¯çº¦å®š](./CONTRIBUTING_COMMIT.md)ï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿å¯ä»¥è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆ `CHANGELOG` ã€‚å…·ä½“æ ¼å¼è¯·å‚è€ƒ commit æ–‡æ¡£è§„èŒƒã€‚



#### å¼€å‘è°ƒè¯•ä»£ç 

```bash

$ npm run build

# Watch
$ npm run watch

# Run test cases
$ npm run test

# Useage
$ wepy build # Global wepy you installed by npm

$ wepy-dev build # Local wepy you compiled by your local repository

$ wepy-debug build # Debug local wepy using node --inspect
```

files.content:
# Commitè§„èŒƒ

åœ¨å¯¹é¡¹ç›®ä½œå‡ºæ›´æ”¹åï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦ç”Ÿæˆ commit æ¥è®°å½•è‡ªå·±çš„æ›´æ”¹ã€‚ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯å‚ç…§ Angular å¯¹ commit æ ¼å¼çš„è§„èŒƒï¼š

## (1) æ ¼å¼

æäº¤ä¿¡æ¯åŒ…æ‹¬ä¸‰ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼š`Header`ï¼Œ`Body` å’Œ `Footer`ã€‚

```
<Header>

<Body>

<Footer>
```

å…¶ä¸­ï¼ŒHeader æ˜¯å¿…éœ€çš„ï¼ŒBody å’Œ Footer å¯ä»¥çœç•¥ã€‚

#### 1> Header

Header éƒ¨åˆ†åªæœ‰ä¸€è¡Œï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ä¿©ä¸ªå­—æ®µï¼š`type`ï¼ˆå¿…éœ€ï¼‰å’Œ`subject`ï¼ˆå¿…éœ€ï¼‰ã€‚

```
<type>: <subject>
```

**type**

type ç”¨äºè¯´æ˜ commit çš„ç±»åˆ«ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å¦‚ä¸‹ç±»åˆ«ï¼š

- featï¼šæ–°åŠŸèƒ½ï¼ˆfeatureï¼‰
- fixï¼šä¿®è¡¥bug
- docï¼šæ–‡æ¡£ï¼ˆdocumentationï¼‰
- styleï¼š æ ¼å¼ï¼ˆä¸å½±å“ä»£ç è¿è¡Œçš„å˜åŠ¨ï¼‰
- refactorï¼šé‡æ„ï¼ˆå³ä¸æ˜¯æ–°å¢åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¸æ˜¯ä¿®æ”¹bugçš„ä»£ç å˜åŠ¨ï¼‰
- testï¼šå¢åŠ æµ‹è¯•
- choreï¼šæ„å»ºè¿‡ç¨‹æˆ–è¾…åŠ©å·¥å…·çš„å˜åŠ¨

**subject**

subject æ˜¯ commit ç›®çš„çš„ç®€çŸ­æè¿°ã€‚

- ä»¥åŠ¨è¯å¼€å¤´ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ç¬¬ä¸€äººç§°ç°åœ¨æ—¶ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚æ”¹å˜ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯æ”¹å˜äº†ã€‚
- ç»“å°¾ä¸åŠ å¥å·ï¼ˆã€‚ï¼‰

#### 2> Body

Body éƒ¨åˆ†æ˜¯å¯¹æœ¬æ¬¡ commit çš„è¯¦ç»†æè¿°ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åˆ†æˆå¤šè¡Œã€‚ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªèŒƒä¾‹ã€‚

```
More detailed explanatory text, if necessary.  Wrap it to 
about 72 characters or so. 

Further paragraphs come after blank lines.

- Bullet points are okay, too
- Use a hanging indent
```

**æ³¨æ„ï¼š**åº”è¯¥è¯´æ˜ä»£ç å˜åŠ¨çš„åŠ¨æœºï¼Œä»¥åŠä¸ä»¥å‰è¡Œä¸ºçš„å¯¹æ¯”ã€‚

#### 3> Footer

â€‹	Footer éƒ¨åˆ†åº”è¯¥åŒ…å«ï¼š(1)Breaking Changes;  (2)å…³é—­ issueï¼›

â€‹	**Breaking Changes**ï¼š

â€‹	å¦‚æœå½“å‰ä»£ç ä¸ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸å…¼å®¹ï¼Œåˆ™ Footer éƒ¨åˆ†ä»¥`BREAKING CHANGE`å¼€å¤´ï¼Œåé¢æ˜¯å¯¹å˜åŠ¨çš„æè¿°ã€ä»¥åŠå˜åŠ¨ç†ç”±å’Œè¿ç§»æ–¹æ³•ã€‚è¿™ç§ä½¿ç”¨è¾ƒå°‘ï¼Œäº†è§£å³å¯ã€‚

â€‹	**Issue éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼š**

- é€šè¿‡ commit å…³è” issueï¼š

  å¦‚æœå½“å‰æäº¤ä¿¡æ¯å…³è”äº†æŸä¸ª issueï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¯ä»¥åœ¨ Footer éƒ¨åˆ†å…³è”è¿™ä¸ª issueï¼š

  ```
  issue #2
  ```

- é€šè¿‡ commit å…³é—­ issueï¼Œå½“æäº¤åˆ°**é»˜è®¤åˆ†æ”¯**æ—¶ï¼Œæäº¤ä¿¡æ¯é‡Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨Â `fix/fixes/fixed`Â ï¼ŒÂ `close/closes/closed`Â æˆ–è€…Â `resolve/resolves/resolved`ç­‰å…³é”®è¯ï¼Œåé¢å†è·Ÿä¸Š issue å·ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å°±ä¼šå…³é—­è¿™ä¸ª issueï¼š

```
Closes #1
```

â€‹	æ³¨æ„ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸æ˜¯æäº¤åˆ°é»˜è®¤åˆ†æ”¯ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¹¶ä¸èƒ½å…³é—­è¿™ä¸ª issueï¼Œä½†æ˜¯åœ¨è¿™ä¸ª issue ä¸‹é¢ä¼šæ˜¾ç¤ºç›¸å…³çš„ä¿¡æ¯è¡¨ç¤ºæ›¾ç»æƒ³è¦å…³é—­è¿™ä¸ª issueï¼Œå½“è¿™ä¸ªåˆ†æ”¯åˆå¹¶åˆ°é»˜è®¤åˆ†æ”¯æ—¶ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥å…³é—­è¿™ä¸ª issue äº†ã€‚

#### 4> ä¾‹å­

ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæ•´çš„ä¾‹å­ï¼š

```
feat: æ·»åŠ äº†åˆ†äº«åŠŸèƒ½

ç»™æ¯ç¯‡æ–‡ç« æ·»åŠ äº†åˆ†äº«åŠŸèƒ½

Status](https://david-dm.org/Tencent/wepy.svg)](https://david-dm.org/Tencent/wepy) ### ä»‹ç» WePY èµ„æºæ±‡æ€»ï¼š[awesome-wepy](https://github.com/aben1188/awesome-wepy) WePY (å‘éŸ³: /'wepi/)æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾è®©å°ç¨‹åºæ”¯æŒç»„ä»¶åŒ–å¼€å‘çš„æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œé€šè¿‡é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„æ‰‹æ®µè®©å¼€å‘è€…å¯ä»¥é€‰æ‹©è‡ªå·±å–œæ¬¢çš„å¼€å‘é£æ ¼å»å¼€å‘å°ç¨‹åºã€‚æ¡†æ¶çš„ç»†èŠ‚ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼ŒPromiseï¼ŒAsync Functions çš„å¼•å…¥éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†èƒ½è®©å¼€å‘å°ç¨‹åºé¡¹ç›®å˜å¾—æ›´åŠ ç®€å•ï¼Œé«˜æ•ˆã€‚ åŒæ—¶ WePY ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾æˆé•¿ä¸­çš„æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œå¤§é‡å¸æ”¶å€Ÿé‰´äº†ä¸€äº›ä¼˜åŒ–å‰ç«¯å·¥å…·ä»¥åŠæ¡†æ¶çš„è®¾è®¡ç†å¿µå’Œæ€æƒ³ã€‚å¦‚æœ WePY æœ‰ä¸è¶³åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œæˆ–è€…ä½ æœ‰æ›´å¥½çš„æƒ³æ³•ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿æäº¤ ISSUE æˆ–è€… PRã€‚ ### ç‰¹æ€§ï¼š - ç±» Vue å¼€å‘é£æ ¼ - æ”¯æŒè‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»„ä»¶å¼€å‘ - æ”¯æŒå¼•å…¥ NPM åŒ… - æ”¯æŒ [Promise](https://github.com/wepyjs/wepy/wiki/wepy%E9%A1%B9%E7%9B%AE%E4%B8%AD%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8Promise) - æ”¯æŒ ES2015+ ç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œå¦‚ [Async Functions](https://github.com/wepyjs/wepy/wiki/wepy%E9%A1%B9%E7%9B%AE%E4%B8%AD%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8async-await) - æ”¯æŒå¤šç§ç¼–è¯‘å™¨ï¼ŒLess/Sass/Stylus/PostCSSã€Babel/Typescriptã€Pug - æ”¯æŒå¤šç§æ’ä»¶å¤„ç†ï¼Œæ–‡ä»¶å‹ç¼©ï¼Œå›¾ç‰‡å‹ç¼©ï¼Œå†…å®¹æ›¿æ¢ç­‰ - æ”¯æŒ Sourcemapï¼ŒESLint ç­‰ - å°ç¨‹åºç»†èŠ‚ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œå¦‚è¯·æ±‚åˆ—é˜Ÿï¼Œäº‹ä»¶ä¼˜åŒ–ç­‰ ### Demo ```html { usingComponents: { customComponent: '@/components/customComponent', vendorComponent: 'module:vendorComponent' } } ``` ### å®‰è£…ä½¿ç”¨ #### å®‰è£…ï¼ˆæ›´æ–°ï¼‰ wepy å‘½ä»¤è¡Œå·¥å…·ã€‚ ```console npm install @wepy/cli@next -g ``` #### ç”Ÿæˆå¼€å‘ç¤ºä¾‹ ```console wepy init standard myproject ``` #### å®‰è£…ä¾èµ– ```console cd myproject npm install ``` #### å¼€å‘å®æ—¶ç¼–è¯‘ ```console wepy build --watch ``` #### å¼€å‘è€…å·¥å…·å¯¼å…¥é¡¹ç›® ä½¿ç”¨`å¾®ä¿¡å¼€å‘è€…å·¥å…·`æ–°å»ºé¡¹ç›®ï¼Œæœ¬åœ°å¼€å‘é€‰æ‹©é¡¹ç›®æ ¹ç›®å½•ï¼Œä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å¯¼å…¥é¡¹ç›®é…ç½®ã€‚ ### å“ªäº›å°ç¨‹åºæ˜¯ç”¨ WePY å¼€å‘çš„ è…¾è®¯ç–«è‹—æŸ¥è¯¢å°ç¨‹åºã€ è…¾è®¯ç¿»è¯‘å›å°ç¨‹åºã€ è…¾è®¯åœ°å›¾å°ç¨‹åºã€ ç©è½¬æ•…å®«å°ç¨‹åºã€ æ‰‹æœºå……å€¼+ã€ æ‰‹æœºä½™é¢æŸ¥è¯¢ã€ æ‰‹æœºæµé‡å……å€¼ä¼˜æƒ ã€ [å‹ç¦å›¾ä¹¦é¦†](https://library.ufutx.com)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/glore/library)ã€ [ç´ æ´å•†åŸ](https://github.com/dyq086/wxYuHanStore)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/dyq086/wxYuHanStore)ã€ [NewsLite](https://github.com/yshkk/shanbay-mina)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/yshkk/shanbay-mina)ã€ [æ·±å¤§çš„æ ‘æ´](https://github.com/jas0ncn/szushudong)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/jas0ncn/szushudong)ã€ [æ±‚çŸ¥å¾®é˜…è¯»](https://github.com/KingJeason/wepy-books)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/KingJeason/wepy-books)ã€ [ç»™ä½ çš„ iPhone X æ¢ä¸ªå‘å‹](https://bangs.baran.wang/)ã€ [å¤©å¤©è·Ÿæˆ‘ä¹°](http://www.xiaohongchun.com.cn/index)ã€ [åšæ©™](https://zhanart.com/wepy.html)ã€ ç¾¤è„±å•ã€ ç±³æ·˜è”ç›Ÿã€ å¸®åŠ©åœˆã€ ä¼—å®‰ä¿é™©ç¦åˆ©ã€ é˜…é‚»äºŒæ‰‹ä¹¦ã€ è¶£åº—æ‹›è˜ã€ [æ»¡ç†Šé˜…è¯»ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼š](https://github.com/Thunf/wepy-demo-bookmall) ä¸ƒå¼¦ç´å°åŠ©æ‰‹ã€ ä¸ƒå¼¦ç´å¤§æ•°æ®ã€ çˆ½åˆ°å®¶å°ç¨‹åºã€ [åº”ç”¨å…¨çƒæ’è¡Œ](https://github.com/szpnygo/wepy_ios_top)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/szpnygo/wepy_ios_top)ã€ [we [è¯—è¯å¢¨å®¢](https://github.com/huangjianke/weapp-poem)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/huangjianke/weapp-poem)ã€ [å—äº¬é‚®ç”µå¤§å­¦](https://github.com/GreenPomelo/Undergraduate)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/GreenPomelo/Undergraduate) ... ### äº¤æµç¾¤ WePY äº¤æµç¾¤å·²æ»¡ 500 äººï¼Œè¯·åŠ  gcaufy_helper å¥½å‹æˆ–è€…æ‰«ç åŠ å¥½å‹ï¼ŒéªŒè¯å›å¤ `wepy` æŒ‰ç…§æŒ‡å¼•è¿›ç¾¤ã€‚ ![wepy_qr_code](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2182004/82732473-feb50c80-9d3f-11ea-9a5f-0efc6ce40f74.png) ### å‚ä¸è´¡çŒ® å¦‚æœä½ æœ‰å¥½çš„æ„è§æˆ–å»ºè®®ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿ç»™æˆ‘ä»¬æ Issues æˆ– Pull Requestsï¼Œä¸ºæå‡å¾®ä¿¡å°ç¨‹åºå¼€å‘ä½“éªŒè´¡çŒ®åŠ›é‡ã€‚
è¯¦è§ï¼š[CONTRIBUTING.md](./CONTRIBUTING.md) [è…¾è®¯å¼€æºæ¿€åŠ±è®¡åˆ’](https://opensource.tencent.com/contribution) é¼“åŠ±å¼€å‘è€…çš„å‚ä¸å’Œè´¡çŒ®ï¼ŒæœŸå¾…ä½ çš„åŠ å…¥ã€‚ ### Links [Documentation](https://tencent.github.io/wepy/) [Changelog](https://tencent.github.io/wepy/document.html#/changelog) [Contributing](./CONTRIBUTING.md) [License MIT](./LICENSE)

files.name: README_EN.md
files.content:
English | [ç®€ä½“ä¸­æ–‡](./README.md) ## WePY 2 (beta) [![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/wepy.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/js/wepy) [![travis-ci](https://travis-ci.org/Tencent/wepy.svg?branch=1.7.x)](https://travis-ci.org/Tencent/wepy) ![Github CI](https://github.com/Tencent/wepy/workflows/WePY%20CI%20Build/badge.svg?branch=2.0.x) [![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/Tencent/wepy/badge.svg?branch=1.7.x)](https://coveralls.io/github/Tencent/wepy?branch=1.7.x) [![Dependency Status](https://david-dm.org/Tencent/wepy.svg)](https://david-dm.org/Tencent/wepy) ### Introduce WePY resource summaryï¼š[awesome-wepy](https://github.com/aben1188/awesome-wepy) WePY (pronounced: /'wepi/) is a framework that enables componentization of small programs by pre-compiling them so that developers can choose their own development style.Details optimization of the framework, the introduction of Promise and Async Functions are all aimed at making it easier and more efficient to develop applets. At the same time, WePY is also a growing framework, drawing heavily on the design concepts and ideas of some front-end optimization tools and frameworks.If WePY has a problem, or if you have a better idea, feel free to submit an ISSUE or PR. ### Features: - Class Vue development style - Support for custom component development - Support for introducing NPM packages - support [Promise](https://github.com/wepyjs/wepy/wiki/wepy%E9%A1%B9%E7%9B%AE%E4%B8%AD%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8Promise) - Support for ES2015+ featuresï¼Œå¦‚ [Async Functions](https://github.com/wepyjs/wepy/wiki/wepy%E9%A1%B9%E7%9B%AE%E4%B8%AD%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8async-await) - Supports multiple compilers, Less/Sass/Stylus/PostCSS, Babel/Typescript, Pug - Supports a variety of plug-in processing, file compression, image compression, content replacement, etc - Supports Sourcemap, ESLint, etc - Small program details optimization, such as request queuing, event optimization, etc ### Demo ```html { usingComponents: { customComponent: '@/components/customComponent', vendorComponent: 'module:vendorComponent' } } ``` ### Usage #### Install (upgrade) the WEPY command-line tool. ```bash npm install @wepy/cli@next -g ``` #### Get start with an example ```console wepy init standard myproject ``` #### Install dependencies ```console cd myproject npm install ``` #### Watch mode ```console wepy build --watch ``` #### Import project Create a new project using`WeChat developer tool`.If the local developer selects the project root directory, the project configuration will be automatically imported. ### Which applets are developed with WePY è…¾è®¯ç–«è‹—æŸ¥è¯¢å°ç¨‹åºã€ è…¾è®¯ç¿»è¯‘å›å°ç¨‹åºã€ è…¾è®¯åœ°å›¾å°ç¨‹åºã€ ç©è½¬æ•…å®«å°ç¨‹åºã€ æ‰‹æœºå……å€¼+ã€ æ‰‹æœºä½™é¢æŸ¥è¯¢ã€ æ‰‹æœºæµé‡å……å€¼ä¼˜æƒ ã€ [å‹ç¦å›¾ä¹¦é¦†](https://library.ufutx.com)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/glore/library)ã€ [ç´ æ´å•†åŸ](https://github.com/dyq086/wxYuHanStore)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/dyq086/wxYuHanStore)ã€ [NewsLite](https://github.com/yshkk/shanbay-mina)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/yshkk/shanbay-mina)ã€ [è¥¿å®‰æ‰¾æ‹¼è½¦](https://github.com/chenqingspring)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/chenqingspring)ã€ [æ·±å¤§çš„æ ‘æ´](https://github.com/jas0ncn/szushudong)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/jas0ncn/szushudong)ã€ [æ±‚çŸ¥å¾®é˜…è¯»](https://github.com/KingJeason/wepy-books)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/KingJeason/wepy-books)ã€ [ç»™ä½ çš„ iPhone X æ¢ä¸ªå‘å‹](https://bangs.baran.wang/)ã€ [å¤©å¤©è·Ÿæˆ‘ä¹°](http://www.xiaohongchun.com.cn/index)ã€ [åšæ©™](https://zhanart.com/wepy.html)ã€ ç¾¤è„±å•ã€ ç±³æ·˜è”ç›Ÿã€ å¸®åŠ©åœˆã€ ä¼—å®‰ä¿é™©ç¦åˆ©ã€ é˜…é‚»äºŒæ‰‹ä¹¦ã€ è¶£åº—æ‹›è˜ã€ [æ»¡ç†Šé˜…è¯»ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼š](https://github.com/Thunf/wepy-demo-bookmall) [å¾®ä¿¡å°ç¨‹åº](https://github.com/Thunf/wepy-demo-bookmall)ã€[æ”¯ä»˜å®å°ç¨‹åºï¼‰](https://github.com/Thunf/wepy-demo-bookmall/tree/alipay)ã€ è‚²å„¿æŸšé“ã€ å¹³è¡Œè¿›å£æŠ¥ä»·å†…å‚ã€ GitHub æ˜é‡‘ç‰ˆã€ ç­çº§ç¾¤ç®¡ã€ é²œèŠ±è¯´å°åº—ã€ é€›äººå¤‡å¿˜ã€ è‹±è¯­åŠ©æ‰‹å›ã€ èŠ±èŠ±ç™¾ç§‘ã€ ç‹¬è§’å…½å…¬å¸ã€ çˆ±ç¾½å®¢ç¾½æ¯›çƒã€ æ–‘é©¬å°åº—ã€ å°å°ç¾½çƒã€ åŸ¹æ©åŒ»å­¦ã€ å†œèµ„ä¼˜é€‰ã€ å…¬åŠ¡å‘˜æœå¤•åˆ·é¢˜ã€ ä¸ƒå¼¦ç´å°åŠ©æ‰‹ã€ ä¸ƒå¼¦ç´å¤§æ•°æ®ã€ çˆ½åˆ°å®¶å°ç¨‹åºã€ [åº”ç”¨å…¨çƒæ’è¡Œ](https://github.com/szpnygo/wepy_ios_top)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/szpnygo/wepy_ios_top)ã€ [we å·å¤§](https://github.com/mohuishou/scuplus-wechat)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/mohuishou/scuplus-wechat)ã€ èŠä¼šå„¿ã€ [è¯—è¯å¢¨å®¢](https://github.com/huangjianke/weapp-poem)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/huangjianke/weapp-poem)ã€ [å—äº¬é‚®ç”µå¤§å­¦](https://github.com/GreenPomelo/Undergraduate)[ï¼ˆå¼€æºï¼‰](https://github.com/GreenPomelo/Undergraduate) ... ### Wechat group WePY group has reached 500 membersï¼ŒPlease add gcaufy_helper friends or scan the code to add friends, verify the reply 'wepy' according to the reference to enter the group. ![wepy_qr_code](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2182004/82732473-feb50c80-9d3f-11ea-9a5f-0efc6ce40f74.png) ### Contribution If you have any comments or Suggestions, please feel free to contribute to improving the WeChat app-development experience by asking for Issues or Pull Requests.
see detailsï¼š[CONTRIBUTING.md](./CONTRIBUTING.md) [Tencent Open Source Incentive Plan](https://opensource.tencent.com/contribution) EncouraTencent Open Source Incentive Plange developers to participate and contribute. Look forward to your participation. ### Links [Documentation](https://tencent.github.io/wepy/) [Changelog](https://tencent.github.io/wepy/document.html#/changelog) [Contributing](./CONTRIBUTING.md) [License MIT](./LICENSE)

files.name: package-lock.json
package.json
files.content:
{
  "name": "wepy",
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "description": "",
  "main": "",
  "scripts": {
    "lint": "eslint ./ --ext .js",
    "dev": "chokidar '**/*.wpy' '**/*.js' -c 'npm run dev:all' -i '/dist/'",
    "build": "node ./scripts/build.js",
    "build:core": "rollup -w -c scripts/config.js --environment TARGET:core",
    "bootstrap": "./node_modules/.bin/lerna bootstrap --loglevel silly",
    "bootstrap:prod": "./node_modules/.bin/lerna bootstrap --loglevel -- --production --no-optional",
    "test": "npm run lint -- --fix && npm run test:cov",
    "test:unit": "node ./test/unit.js",
    "test:cov": "nyc npm run test:unit",
    "test:build": "./test/build.sh",
    "clean": "node ./scripts/clean.js",
    "view": "./node_modules/.bin/verpub view -l",
    "release": "./node_modules/.bin/verpub publish",
    "release:dry": "./node_modules/.bin/verpub publish --dry-run",
    "changelog": "lerna-changelog",
    "commit": "git cz"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git@github.com:Tencent/wepy.git"
  },
  "author": "Gcaufy",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/Tencent/wepy/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/Tencent/wepy#readme",
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel": "^6.5.2",
    "babel-cli": "^6.18.0",
    "babel-eslint": "^7.1.1",
    "babel-preset-es2015": "^6.18.0",
    "babel-preset-stage-1": "^6.16.0",
    "chai": "^4.1.2",
    "chalk": "^1.1.3",
    "chokidar": "^3.4.0",
    "commitizen": "^3.1.1",
    "cz-conventional-changelog": "^2.1.0",
    "enquirer": "^2.3.0",
    "eslint": "^7.5.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^6.10.0",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^3.1.2",
    "esm": "^3.2.25",
    "event-stream": "3.3.4",
    "fs-extra": "^5.0.0",
    "husky": "^1.3.1",
    "istanbul": "^0.4.5",
    "jsonlint": "^1.6.2",
    "learn": "^0.1.5",
    "lerna": "^3.22.1",
    "lerna-changelog": "^1.0.1",
    "less": "^3.9.0",
    "mkpath": "^1.0.0",
    "mocha": "^6.2.3",
    "nyc": "^15.0.0",
    "prettier": "^1.18.2",
    "read-pkg": "^4.0.1",
    "rimraf": "^3.0.2",
    "rollup": "^0.56.5",
    "rollup-plugin-buble": "^0.19.2",
    "rollup-plugin-replace": "^2.0.0",
    "serve-static": "^1.11.1",
    "through2": "^2.0.3",
    "validate-commit-msg": "^2.14.0",
    "verpub": "^0.1.2"
  },
  "babel": {
    "comments": false,
    "presets": [
      [
        "es2015",
        {
          "loose": true
        }
      ],
      "stage-1"
    ],
    "plugins": [],
    "ignore": [
      "./packages/wepy-web/src/components/*.vue"
    ],
    "env": {
      "test": {
        "auxiliaryCommentBefore": "istanbul ignore next",
        "plugins": [
          "istanbul"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=8.9.4"
  },
  "husky": {
    "hooks": {
      "pre-commit": "npm run lint",
      "pre-push": "npm run test",
      "commit-msg": "npx validate-commit-msg"
    }
  },
  "changelog": {
    "labels": {
      "feat": ":rocket: New Feature",
      "bug": ":bug: Bug Fix",
      "doc": ":memo: Documentation",
      "internal": ":house: Internal",
      "breaking": ":boom: Breaking Change"
    }
  },
  "config": {
    "validate-commit-msg": {
      "helpMessage": "\nPlease fix your commit message (and consider using http://npm.im/commitizen)\n",
      "types": [
        "feat",
        "fix",
        "docs",
        "style",
        "refactor",
        "perf",
        "test",
        "chore",
        "revert",
        "build",
        "release",
        "custom"
      ],
      "warnOnFail": false,
      "autoFix": true
    },
    "commitizen": {
      "path": "./node_modules/cz-conventional-changelog"
    }
  }
}
